item.title: Dagger (the CI/CD Tool, not the Knife) In-Depth - Everything You Need to Know (as of Apr 2022)
item.author: Tiexin Guo | 郭铁心
item.description: 1 What is Dagger? TL;DR: Dagger runs your CI/CD pipelines locally in a Docker container, and can run the container in any CI environment (as long as that CI can run a container, of course.) Do you want the long answer to this million-dollar question? It’s hard to answer, honestly.
